paragraphs: I'm a passionate full-stack developer with a keen eye for design and a love for creating seamless user experiences. With expertise in modern web technologies, I bring ideas to life through clean, efficient code.
When I'm not coding, you'll find me exploring new technologies, contributing to open-source projects, or sharing knowledge with the developer community.

highlights.title: Development
highlights.description: Building scalable web applications with modern frameworks and best practices.

highlights.title: Experience
highlights.description: Delivering high-quality solutions for clients across various industries.

highlights.title: Learning
highlights.description: Continuously expanding my skillset and staying current with industry trends.
